pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: SoloForge is currently 100% free to use.

policy.intro: SoloForge is currently completely free. You can submit and manage your indie products without paying anything.
policy.first50Desc: The first 50 submitted products get opportunities to appear in the high-exposure homepage slots (top and right).
policy.after50Desc: After that, we randomly pick some products from yesterday’s most popular ones (likes + favorites) to fill the slots.
policy.kofiTitle: Get a slot via Ko-fi sponsorship
policy.kofiDesc: You can also sponsor via Ko-fi to request a specific slot for your product. Email ilikexff@gmail.com for details.
policy.priorityDesc: Sponsored products are displayed with the highest priority.

free.title: Free
free.desc: Free exposure for the first 50 submitted products. Each product gets 48 hours of eligibility with daily random placement (top/right).
benefits: Limited to the first 50 submitted products
Up to 48 hours of exposure per product
Random daily placement in homepage top/right slots

top.title: Pro · Top
top.desc: Displayed in the top module on the homepage (highest exposure).

benefits.text: Fixed placement in homepage top slot (left/right)
Fixed placement in homepage right slot (1/2/3)
Up to 3 newsletter mentions per month

right.title: Pro · Right
right.desc: Displayed in the right sidebar module (up to 3 items).

benefits.text: Fixed placement in homepage top slot (left/right)
Fixed placement in homepage right slot (1/2/3)
Up to 1 newsletter mention per month

benefits.title: Benefits
items: Highest priority exposure in homepage top/right slots
Up to 3 newsletter mentions per month
